/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up at the towering buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The trees, lush and green, provide a stark contrast to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The image is a blend of urban architecture and natural elements, showcasing the harmonious coexistence of nature and city life in Beijing.
